Bash(.specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1 -Json "  /sp.specify

I want to create a full-stack RAG chatbot system for a Docusaurus-based book. This is Part 2 of my project.

**Project Requirements:**

- The RAG chatbot must be embedded inside my Docusaurus book (published on GitHub Pages).
- The chatbot must be able to answer questions about the book‚Äôs content.
- It must also answer questions based ONLY on text the user selects and sends to the chatbot.
- Backend must be built using:
  - FastAPI
  - OpenAI Agents / ChatKit SDKs
  - Neon Serverless Postgres (for chat history, metadata, logs)
  - Qdrant Cloud Free Tier (vector DB for embeddings)
- The system must include:
  - Document ingestion pipeline for my book‚Äôs markdown files
  - Embedding generator
  - Qdrant upsert process
  - A retrieval system (vector search + re-ranking)
  - OpenAI-powered response engine with RAG context injection
- The frontend widget must:
  - Run inside Docusaurus
  - Call my FastAPI backend
  - Include a mode for ‚ÄúAsk about selected text only‚Äù
  - Include a floating chat" -Number 1 -ShortName "rag-chatbot" "RAG chatbot for Docusaurus book")
